so before we get into making the

it's about 1/2 of a cup now if you

you wanted to substitute something else

together and what the salt is gonna do
it's gonna pull out a good amount of

that's gonna do is it's gonna help us to
kind of regulate the amount of moisture
that's in the filling which will help to

in kind of giving an initial sear or
